attributes.action: Stop Hereford & Worcester Fire & Rescue Service Budgets Cuts
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned firmly believe Budget Cuts to the Hereford & Worcester Fire & Rescue Service is totally unjustified.

The budget plans are designed to save £4.7 million over the next 3 years, however cutting frontline emergency cover is totally unacceptable.

We want the Government to stop the cuts affecting Fire Station closures & Pump removals in Herefordshire & Worcestershire.
